title: 41. Summer Skin Tips: How to Deal With MACNE, Pigmentation, SPF, Travel, Chlorinated Pools + More!
description:
Hi treatment Roomies,

Welcome to our episode on how to care for your skin in the summer! It's hot, you may be traveling, jumping in pools, soaking up the sun and enjoying a cocktail with makeup on and a face mask. Here's how to do it right!  Xoxo, Tess & Lo

Educate, Donate, Participate for Justice:

https://blacklivesmatter.com

https://www.standwithbre.com

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's Blog www.lauren-kruger.com

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' TikTok @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd
